column5: Well, with the nice weather and me starting to feel a little better from my bout with the flu, we had a few hours this afternoon to head out and fish.  We ended up at one of our good spots at around 1pm and began drifting.  It started out really slow, but it's not often we get to fish during the day, so we stayed out, basking in the sunlight.  I was having lots of line issues today...it seems that when things are going right on the trib, things just run smoothly...almost machine-like.  Today wasn't my day....LOL.  Anyhow, it took over an hour, but bly finally sees her float go down and she says "Fish on!!".  After a quick fight, she landed this nice female!   After that fish, I was hopeful that the bite was going to turn on.  A few more line tangles for me and bly says again "Fish on!".  This one was an active one...taking multiple runs away from her...then turning on a dime and swimming straight at her.  She did a great job and landed this really nice sized male....   After she landed that one, we began drifting again and we hear "Bly's kickin' your butt like usual".  We look up and see a fellow OFNer snickering at us...LOL.  Well, truth be told, she did kick my butt today!!  On the last drift of the day, I hooked into a really nice fish, but it spit the hook after about 2 minutes on.  Oh well...we had to get on home.  Not a bad way to spend a sunny Easter Monday....back to the grind and crappy winter weather tomorrow....LOL.
Great catch u 2 !!!!!!,cliff you know better by now,that you just dont stand a chance..LOL..LOL..   nice pics too,glad you guys are getting lots of fish..
The Gals Rock Again..... As ususal  Way to go Bly.  Glad you had a good day.  Too bad about you Cliff     Hope you were taking notes  Great report Cliff.  Joey
Way yo go Bly nice fish.Sorry about your luck there Cliff.

WTG Carole  Oh Cliff they sell this stuff at the pharmacie called no more tangles  I am sure Cliff was a good net man today.  Whats this no SNOW in the pics.Send your warm weather here will ya  Who was the other OFNer at yout Trib?
WTG Bly, is that how it works the person who gets the least fish writes the report? So usually you eh Cliff?

Good to see you guys got into some fish!  I actually was not going to go fishing today, but I saw you two in your car at Gibb and Stevenson with the rods in the back and decided I was going fishing too! I made my girlfriend take me home haha!
Cliff  Did you end up getting that fish that I pointed out or was it BLY lol  We ended up with some good number today as well...  Good seeing you again and lets get out soon  Dave
Congratulations to Bly on some fine, fine fish, and to Cliff for a great report and pictures.  Double you tee gee.  Glad to hear you are on the mend, ccmt.  Best.
What a great day for you Bly....hang in there Cliff haha Thanks for sharing
Cliff...............I sense a pattern here...............and I am not talking about fishing tactics,

Nice fish.  It sounds like the average day when I take my wife out...she gets more and bigger fish, I get more and bigger knots  LOL.  Made the drive to Bowmanville(sp) Creek for the very first time today, got there after lunch and went 0 for 2. The water visabilty went down hill as the day went on.  Beauty day to be out though.
You made a good effort Cliff, sorry for the comment but I had too eheheh  Geoff

HA!!! http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dFRQVTCbW04 How many people wanna kick some ass?... Bly does, Bly does!!!  Line issues you say???... and just think, it was just last night you were braggin' on that 2 yr. old crap line on your float rod! (I told you the cake mixer would make an excellent line twister Bly!)  Excellent report and pics y'all!  I'm doing my best to pump y'all some more nice days up there so we can see more of these reports.  Sick and then an ass-whoppin' at fishin'... sux to be you eh Cliff?
Nice fish Bly. WTG    Better luck next time Cliff.
You guys are soon gonna have the fishing mags paparazzi chasin' yuz  down. Great stuff!!!!!!!!!!!!!
nice ones,congrats
nice fish...good job guys....wish I could of been out there with ya !!
Hey, weren't only government offices and banks still on holliday today? What were you doing home? LOL!  (nice fish btw   )

Smokin!   Congrats on yet another victory, Bly.  Well buys, I think it's time we put this one on Pro-Line.  Sorry Cliff, but unless you get some new line, my chips are on Bly for the next round!   p.-

Cliff, out-fishing Carole isn't meant to be.  Women are built different than us.  They have x-ray vision, built in sonar and mind controlling powers to make even the most skilled angler skunk and the most spooked fish bite.  I guess we know who wears the waders in that family.  Top Angling Carole
I agree with MJL.  Carole's beauty and pheromones are irresistible to the fish.  Cliff, I suggest you where something a little more revealing next time. At least you'll catch a sucker
Wouldn't he be cute in something sheer and frilly?
